Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! This classic, elegant and sophisticated silver-tone exhibition pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a precision 17 jewel mechanical movement showcased when the front and back covers are opened, highly polished intricately designed silver-tone case with Roman numerals plus scratch resistant mineral crystals to protect your timepiece. Other features include bold blue cobalt hands, a 15 inch curb chain that can attach to your belt loop and a bonus solid brass desktop stand to display your timepiece proudly when not worn. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy. - Classic and elegant silver-tone 17 jewel mechanical double cover exhibition pocket watch with Roman numeral design - Both front and back covers open to expose elegant 17 jewel mechanical movement and it's moving parts - Rich antique style blue cobalt hour, minute and seconds hands plus scratch resistant mineral crystal - Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment plus solid brass desk top stand - Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions Gotham Men's Silver-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch with Desktop Stand #
